mapper.select: select CTRCTCERTRELSGMTSEQNO, BRERNM, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTCERTRELSGMT

select count(1) from pbcrs_report_CtrctCertRelSgmt info1 join Pbcrs_Report_CtrctCertRel info2 on info1.ctrctcertrelsgmtseqno=info2.ctrctcertrelsgmtseqno where info1.ctrctcertrelsgmtseqno=#{CtrctCertRelSgmtSeqNo}
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTCERTRELSGMTM (CTRCTCERTRELSGMTSEQNO, BRERNM, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS) select CTRCTCERTRELSGMTSEQNO, BRERNM, '0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTCERTRELSGMT where CTRCTCERTRELSGMTSEQNO = #{CtrctCertRelSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
